name: $code
desc: Returns: Indicates a meaning for the stratifier. This can be as simple as a unique identifier, or it can establish meaning in a broader context by drawing from a terminology, allowing stratifiers to be correlated across measures.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates a meaning for the stratifier. This can be as simple as a unique identifier, or it can establish meaning in a broader context by drawing from a terminology, allowing stratifiers to be correlated across measures.

name: $description
desc: Returns: The human readable description of this stratifier criteria.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The human readable description of this stratifier criteria.

name: $criteria
desc: Returns: An expression that specifies the criteria for the stratifier. This is typically the name of an expression defined within a referenced library, but it may also be a path to a stratifier element.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An expression that specifies the criteria for the stratifier. This is typically the name of an expression defined within a referenced library, but it may also be a path to a stratifier element.

name: $component
desc: Returns: A component of the stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

name: $addcomponent
desc: A component of the stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A component of the stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.
